headline: Show HN: I made desktop app to browse and reduce AWS cloud costs
description:
I made CloudPouch application to help individual engineers or architects to understand and reduce AWS costs.

I have already earned few hundred bucks on it, and decided to spend it on explainer video that is provided in the link. I hope you like it.

Here are several facts that make CloudPouch unique:

1. It is a desktop application, not SaaS. Thus, you don't need to share your cost data with my company.

The application connects directly to AWS from your computer, without anything in a middle.

2. Since that, you don't need any special approvals from management to use it, as you don't share sensitive information with any 3-rd party. All you need is ce:GetCostAndUsage privilege to access cost data.

This is standard IAM action, that many engineers already have access to.

3. There is no red tape. That's why you can use it with all AWS accounts to which you already have programmatic access.

CloudPouch loads your AWS CLI and SSO profiles that you already have defined on your computer. Without any additional configuration.

This is super handy!

4. It saves a lot of time because you can switch between different accounts inside the CloudPouch application.

You don't need to login into the AWS web console, deal with multiple browser windows, and all that hassle.

I overlook many accounts. I can use it with all of them.

5. It shows cost data in a predefined way. That means that billing data from any of your accounts will be displayed in the same, familiar way.

Even BETWEEN accounts belonging to different customers of yours.

This makes you more productive!

6. It's cost-effective. A single license costs $10 per month, regardless of: - the number of AWS accounts you use, - the bill size on each of them.

This makes it a superb choice for any cloud consultant, architect, or engineer.

7. It works on macOS, Windows, and Linux, and is really fast!

https://cloudpouch.dev/

I'm looking for your feedback and ideas how to make it more useful for AWS users.
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: 我制作了桌面应用程序来浏览和减少AWS云的成本
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: 我製作了桌面應用程序來瀏覽和減少AWS雲的成本
description_zh-Hans:
我制作了CloudPouch应用程序，以帮助个人工程师或架构师了解和减少AWS成本。

我已经在上面赚了几百美元，并决定把它花在链接中提供的解释视频上。我希望你喜欢它。

以下是使CloudPouch独特的几个事实：

1. 它是一个桌面应用程序，而不是SaaS。因此，你不需要与我的公司分享你的成本数据。

该应用程序从你的计算机直接连接到AWS，没有任何中间环节。

2.因为，你不需要管理层的任何特别批准来使用它，因为你不与任何第3方分享敏感信息。你只需要ce:GetCostAndUsage权限来访问成本数据。

这是标准的IAM操作，许多工程师已经可以访问了。这就是为什么你可以将它用于你已经拥有编程访问权的所有AWS帐户。

CloudPouch加载你已经在电脑上定义的AWS CLI和SSO配置文件。

这真是太方便了！

4.它节省了大量的时间，因为你可以在CloudPouch应用程序内切换不同的账户。

你不需要登录到AWS Web控制台，处理多个浏览器窗口，以及所有这些麻烦的事情。我可以在所有账户中使用它。

5. 它以预定义的方式显示成本数据。这意味着你的任何账户的计费数据都将以相同的、熟悉的方式显示。

甚至是属于你的不同客户的账户之间。

这使你的工作效率更高！

6.它具有成本效益。单个许可证的费用为每月10美元，无论。 - 你使用的AWS账户的数量。 -

这使得它成为任何云顾问、建筑师或工程师的最佳选择。

7.它可以在macOS、Windows和Linux上运行，而且速度非常快！

https://cloudpouch.dev/

我正在寻找您的反馈和想法，如何使它对AWS用户更有用。
